item.title: WATCH: 4-year-old girl gets jury duty summons
item.description: More than 500,000 Connecticut residents are summoned for jury duty each year, and preschooler Zara Ibrahimi is one of them.

item.title: WATCH: Thousands of golden retrievers to meet up in one town
item.description: ABC News' Danny New has the details on the Goldens in Golden event being held in Golden, Colorado.

item.title: Iran and US to reopen nuclear talks in Oman after weeks of tension
item.description: The U.S. is seeking "zero nuclear capability" from Iran, the White House said.

item.title: Russian lieutenant general shot by assailant in Moscow, investigators say
item.description: "The victim was hospitalized," the Investigative Committee of Russia said.

item.title: Guthrie family issues message to potential kidnappers: 'We want to talk to you'
item.description: Nancy Guthrie, 84, was last seen on Saturday night, authorities said.
